P

placeShip(int, int, String, int) - Method in class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GameEngine
Places a ship on the specified co-ordinates if it satisfied a fixed set of conditions

The input row and column values are used evaluated to ensure that no other ship already exists within the bounds of the new ship's position.
Player - Class in com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements
The player class contains the data elements and methods to manage the state and behavior of a single player in the DotCom game.
Player(String) - Constructor for class com.lxisoft.battleship.game.elements.Player
Constructor for the Player class
playerCount - Static variable in class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GuessGameLauncher
 
Players - Variable in class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GameEngine
 
printBoard(int) - Method in class com.lxisoft.battle.game.app.GameEngine
Used to display the Game Board.

The print board method displays a square matrix of the specified board size.
